name: obsidian-long-sentence-highlighter
description: Obsidian plugin that highlights sentences exceeding a configurable word count threshold to improve writing clarity

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp src/styles.css dist/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: RobertMeissner
